High Prefect Aklan: Finally, the one with the Mark of Future has appeared! That Human must have set things in motion after all. Well, it matters little. I wanted to see you was because I wish to make known the Orcs' position regarding the Kamael. Listen to my words as though Pa'agrio himself speaks to you!
